title: Windows 11 24h2, RDP no longer works on mRemoteNG
author: aseiras
body_snippet:
Since windows 11 updated to 24h2, the RDP no longer works unless you Download the app Remote Desktop Connection from the Microsoft store and use that instead.

Any idea how to make mRemoteNG work again?

iterations.description: Not our bug - Windows Update KB5050094 caused RDP failures, fixed by KB5044285

comments.snippet:
I've used remoteNG on a Windows 11 24H2 fresh install and it worked fine.

that older version, we are not working on updates for it anymore, for testing (not production work) you could try 1.77-3-nb (.net6) for older system support (like windows 7 and windows server 2008) or our new one (actively testing at the moment) - 1.78.1-nb (.net8) -> https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/releases/tag/2025.01.27-v1.78.1-nb

note: non production versions dont have settings saving enabled to avoid mess with working version, the rest should work

comments.snippet:
There is an issue with 24H2 W11 cousing this problem.
On the remote machine do this chages and all will works:
Changes in GPO

Local Computer Policy 
> Computer Configuration
> Administrative Templates
> Windows Components 
> Remote Desktop Services 
> Remote Desktop Session Host 
> Connections 
> Select network detection on the server  - set to Enabled, 

Inside the above change this one; 
Turn off Connect Time Detect and Continuous Network Detect
